§ Kaahmaah Inspirations

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

⚠️ **SPOILER ALERT**

The inspiration for the name of the [[kaahmaah]] character from [[world-18]] is the **Hawaiian language** word //kamaloli//.

The first syllable in **kamaloli** also sounds like **ka** from **ancient Egyptian mythology**.
